trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_SEQ_00<tab>This Ananta battlemaid wants to cheer up a friend's father.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Ananta battlemaid.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the stonemason.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Ananta battlemaid.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_TODO_03<tab>Search for the stonemason's hammer in the designated area.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the stonemason's hammer to the stonemason.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_000<tab>I require your help to deliver sssomething of value.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_001<tab>A ssstrider I was pleased to call friend recently died in battle. I want to deliver a bracelet of his to his father.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_002<tab>If memory ssserves, they hailed from a village called Ala Gannha. I would go there by myssself, but I worry my appearance might frighten them.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_003<tab>That is why I would like you to accompany me. To show I come in peace. Now, let usss make our way there.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_010<tab>I have been waiting for you, ssstrider. I believe my friend sssaid his father was a ssstonemason who is fond of fishing.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_011<tab>I will wait here ssso I do not cause a commotion. Please bring my friend's father to me once you have located him.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_012<tab>I will wait here ssso I do not cause a commotion. Please bring my friend's father to me once you have located him.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_020<tab>I don't believe we've met?
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_021<tab>You've come with an Ananta to deliver my son's bracelet? I had been wondering if anyone was going to bring me his former possessions.

TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_022<tab>I first heard of his passing a while ago from a Resistance fighter. Initially, I resented both the Empire <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> the Resistance equally for taking him from me.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_023<tab>However, now I have calmed down somewhat. I'm oh so proud of my boy. He did everything he could to free us from the Empire's clutches.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_024<tab>My thanks to you and this Ananta for bringing his bracelet back to me. I shall go collect it now.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_025<tab>My thanks to you and this Ananta for bringing my son's bracelet back to me.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_030<tab>Thank you, ssstrider.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_031<tab>Your ssson treated all races equally. He would often talk to me fondly of his family.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_032<tab>He sssaid you made that bracelet for him just before he left to join the Resissstance.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_033<tab>I was ssso moved by this I tried to make my own. Alasss, it did not go very well.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_034<tab>I'd no idea he spoke of me to his friends. Thank you for sharing that with me.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_035<tab>How about I make you a similar bracelet as a token of my gratitude?
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_036<tab>I would like that very much.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_037<tab>In that case there is one thing I need your help finding first.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_038<tab>Ever since I lost my boy, I've been drinking a little more than usual and well...it seems I managed to misplace my hammer while I was somewhat inebriated.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_039<tab>Understood. I shall sssearch for this hammer.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_040<tab>Ssstrider, please lend me your help as well. It may not be easy to find.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_100_040<tab>Let me know if you find the ssstonemason's hammer.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_050<tab>My memory's so foggy I honestly have no idea where I lost it.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_051<tab>That's the one! Thank you so much. Now I can set about making another bracelet.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_MASON02870_000_052<tab>Would you mind telling me more about my son while I work?
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_053<tab>It would be my pleasure. I have many fond memories of him.
TEXT_STMBDZ914_02870_ANANTAWARRIOR02870_000_054<tab>Thank you for your help, ssstrider.
